channel.title: Lee Penney
channel.description: Welcome to Lee Penney's home on the web

item.title: Ensuring Your Links Work
item.description: They're one of the reasons for the web to exist, they're part of the net at a fundamental level and without them it would be a much harder place to visit. I'm talking, of course, about links. They'

item.title: Goodwood Festival of Speed
item.description: I was lucky enough to attend this year's Festival of Speed at Goodwood. I thought I would share my advice having been there.

item.title: Creating Cards with Primitive
item.description: I'm a bit of a scrooge when it comes to Christmas cards, well cards in general to be honest. They're nice enough but you open them, prop them up for a while and then throw them out. As such I don't

item.title: Automation with IFTTT
item.description: I have a few power sockets that can be switched wirelessly, mainly Energenie devices triggered by my Raspberry Pi. I've had a web interface for ages, and some automation around things like sunrise/
